Description: Two boys leap into the Hooghly River near Howrah Bridge, capturing a raw, everyday moment of childhood, freedom, and riverfront life in Kolkata.

Bangla Misti Hub at Eco Park is a unique destination dedicated to traditional Bengali sweets, offering a wide variety of authentic delicacies from renowned sweet makers across West Bengal.
